TopicTitle: Did a doubletake in the mall yesterday

Articles.Content:
Saw an advertisement for these shoes when I was at the mall yesterday

[http://birthdayshoes.com/new-balance-minimus-barefoot-shoe-line-slated-for-spring-2011](http://birthdayshoes.com/new-balance-minimus-barefoot-shoe-line-slated-for-spring-2011)

They\'re one letter away from sharing a name with a KSP celestial body
That needs to be a mod, now go do it! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Haha leave it to Photoshop to take it two steps farther
